short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Trust Redirect keeps you safe by redirecting you away from scam websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Trust Redirect is designed to protect users from scam websites, ensuring a safe and secure browsing experience. When you navigate to a potentially harmful site, Trust Redirect automatically redirects you to a safer page, preventing you from interacting with malicious content.

The extension constantly updates its list of scam websites, staying vigilant against the latest online threats. With Trust Redirect, you can browse the web confidently, knowing you're shielded from phishing scams, fraudulent websites, and other online dangers.

Whether you're shopping, researching, or simply surfing the web, Trust Redirect works quietly in the background to protect your personal information and maintain your online security. Easily report suspicious websites to help others stay safe, and join a growing network committed to making the internet a safer place.
